bike.description: S-Works SL4 FACT 11r, FACT IS construction, tapered/shaped HT, compact race design, 1-3/8" lower HS bearing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works Tarmac, FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower stainless steel cartridge bearings, w/ 8mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
